00013 namespace Util
00014 {
00015 
00026    template <class Archive, typename T>
00027    inline void serialize(Archive& ar, T& data, const unsigned int version)
00028    {  data.serialize(ar, version); }
00029 
00037    template <class Archive, typename T>
00038    inline void serializeEnum(Archive& ar, T& data, const unsigned int version = 0)
00039    {  
00040       int i;
00041       if (Archive::is_saving()) {
00042          i = static_cast<int>(data);
00043       }
00044       ar & i;
00045       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00046          data = static_cast<T>(i);
00047       }
00048    }
00049 
00057    template <class Archive, typename T>
00058    inline void serializeCheck(Archive& ar, T& data, const char* label = "")
00059    {
00060       T temp;
00061       if (Archive::is_saving()) {
00062          temp = data;
00063       }
00064       ar & temp;
00065       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00066          if (temp != data) {
00067             UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent data");
00068          }
00069       }
00070    }
00071 
00072 }
00073 #endif
